Package net.minestom.server.timer

Class TaskBuilder

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.timer.TaskBuilder
public class TaskBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
A builder which represents a fluent Object to schedule tasks.

You can specify a delay with delay(long, TimeUnit) or repeat(long, TimeUnit) and then schedule the Task with schedule().

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TaskBuilder​(SchedulerManager schedulerManager, java.lang.Runnable runnable)
    Creates a task builder.
    TaskBuilder​(SchedulerManager schedulerManager, java.lang.Runnable runnable, boolean shutdown)
    Creates a task builder.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TaskBuilder clearDelay()
    Clears the delay interval of the Task.
    TaskBuilder clearRepeat()
    Clears the repeat interval of the Task.
    TaskBuilder delay​(long time, TimeUnit unit)
    Specifies that the Task should delay its execution by the specified amount of time.
    TaskBuilder repeat​(long time, TimeUnit unit)
    Specifies that the Task should continue to run after waiting for the specified value until it is terminated.
    Task schedule()
    Schedules this Task for execution.

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskBuilder

      public TaskBuilder​(@NotNull SchedulerManager schedulerManager, @NotNull java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Creates a task builder.
      Note: The task builder creates a normal task.
      Parameters:
      schedulerManager - The manager for the tasks
      runnable - The task to run when scheduled

    • TaskBuilder

      public TaskBuilder​(@NotNull SchedulerManager schedulerManager, @NotNull java.lang.Runnable runnable, boolean shutdown)
      Creates a task builder.
      Parameters:
      schedulerManager - The manager for the tasks
      runnable - The task to run when scheduled
      shutdown - Defines whether the task is a shutdown task

  • Method Details

    • delay

      @NotNull public TaskBuilder delay​(long time, @NotNull TimeUnit unit)
      Specifies that the Task should delay its execution by the specified amount of time.
      Parameters:
      time - The time to delay
      unit - The unit of time for time
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • repeat

      @NotNull public TaskBuilder repeat​(long time, @NotNull TimeUnit unit)
      Specifies that the Task should continue to run after waiting for the specified value until it is terminated.
      Parameters:
      time - The time until the repetition
      unit - The TimeUnit for time
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • clearDelay

      @NotNull public TaskBuilder clearDelay()
      Clears the delay interval of the Task.
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • clearRepeat

      @NotNull public TaskBuilder clearRepeat()
      Clears the repeat interval of the Task.
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • schedule

      @NotNull public Task schedule()
      Schedules this Task for execution.
      Returns:
      the built Task
